_xResult.title: Hot Air Coat
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made wool boucle coat with front zipper
_xResult.longdesc:
Worries fly out the window when you have this custom made wool coat to keep you warm. The generously sized hood and bodice are lined and soft, making this piece both warm and comfortable to wear. The front zipper provides ease of getting in and out, so your winters will be snappy and cozy as can be. Oversized pockets to keep your fingers warm and carry your phone!

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! Street style that is fun and sophisticated. To customize, make sure we have your torso and arm measurements. Also, you can customize the length if you like: measure from your shoulder over largest point of breast to desired length. Put this into the box below to add to your order along with color selection.
